mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xsdj_mx (DJH, SPMC, JLDW, GGXH, SLIAN, SL, HSJE, HSDJ, ZKJE) VALUES (#{djh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spmc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jldw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ggxh, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{slian, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sl, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsje, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsdj, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zkje, jdbcType=DECIMAL})
